languages.text: "Я... не уверен. Возможно, эти тунеядцы верили в сказки про Немезита. Я ведь жаловался этому уб... капитану Френзо, что кучка идиотов картинки по стенам малюет, людей на скверное подбивает. А он что? Все у него "под контролем". Знал бы, что так выйдет, сам бы этих засранцев скрутил да в моровую яму скинул! А теперь, Трон побери, блюстители нам совсем житья не дадут".

traits.locale_text: [Драфт] "Я знал, что что-то происходит, но не думал, что всё зайдёт так далеко...."

languages.text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in the tales of Nemesite. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about some idiots who've been painting pictures on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those sods and thrown them into the pestilence pit myself! And now we'll be pestered by enforcers to no end, void damn it all."
languages.original_text: "Я... не уверен. Возможно, эти тунеядцы верили в сказки про Немезита. Я ведь жаловался этому уб... капитану Френзо, что кучка идиотов картинки по стенам малюет, людей на скверное подбивает. А он что? Все у него "под контролем". Знал бы, что так выйдет, сам бы этих засранцев скрутил да в моровую яму скинул! А теперь, Трон побери, блюстители нам совсем житья не дадут".

traits.locale_text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in Nemesite stories. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about the pictures some bunch of idiots were painting on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those shitheads myself and thrown them into the pestilence pit! And now, the Throne blast it, we're going to see no end of pestering enforcers."

languages.text: «No... no lo tengo claro. A lo mejor esos gorrones creían las historias de Nemesitio. De hecho, me quejé a ese cab... al capitán Frensoe de unos idiotas que estaban pintando su imagen en los muros para incitar a la gente. ¿Y qué respondió? "Lo tengo todo bajo control". De haber sabido que esto acabaría así, ¡habría cogido a esos animales y los habría tirado al foso de pestilencia yo mismo! Y ahora vamos a tener a los guardias encima para los restos, maldita sea».
languages.original_text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in the tales of Nemesite. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about some idiots who've been painting pictures on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those sods and thrown them into the pestilence pit myself! And now we'll be pestered by enforcers to no end, void damn it all."

traits.locale_text: «No... no lo tengo claro. A lo mejor esos gorrones creían las historias de Nemesitio. De hecho, me quejé a ese cab... al capitán Frensoe de unos idiotas que estaban pintando su imagen en los muros para incitar a la gente. ¿Y qué respondió? "Lo tengo todo bajo control". De haber sabido que esto acabaría así, ¡habría cogido a esos animales y los habría tirado al foso de pestilencia yo mismo! Y ahora vamos a tener a los guardias encima para los restos, maldita sea».

languages.text: 「よく…わからんのです。おそらくあのたかり屋どもは、ネメサイトの話を信じていたのでしょう。そういえば、あのクソや…フレンソー中隊長に、壁に絵をかいて、人々を先導している馬鹿どもについて文句を言ったことがあったな。あいつがなんと言ったかって？『すべては私のコントロール下にある』だぞ。こんなことになると知っていたら、あの馬鹿どもを捕まえて、自分で疫病の穴に放り込んでいたさ！おかげで今、俺らはエンフォーサーにどこまでもしつこく付きまとわれるハメになったんだ、くそったれめ」
languages.original_text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in the tales of Nemesite. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about some idiots who've been painting pictures on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those sods and thrown them into the pestilence pit myself! And now we'll be pestered by enforcers to no end, void damn it all."

traits.locale_text: 「よく…わからんのです。おそらくあのたかり屋どもは、ネメサイトの話を信じていたのでしょう。そういえば、あのクソや…フレンソー中隊長に、壁に絵をかいて、人々を先導している馬鹿どもについて文句を言ったことがあったな。あいつがなんと言ったかって？『すべては私のコントロール下にある』だぞ。こんなことになると知っていたら、あの馬鹿どもを捕まえて、自分で疫病の穴に放り込んでいたさ！おかげで今、俺らはエンフォーサーにどこまでもしつこく付きまとわれるハメになったんだ、くそったれめ」

languages.text: “我也……不太确定，可能是那群吃白食的家伙把涅墨斯特的故事当真了吧。好巧不巧，我之前找过那个王八——我是说，我找过弗伦索队长，和他说过这件事情。我告诉他说总有一群白痴在墙上乱画，煽动民众，可他是怎么说的？‘一切都在我的控制之中。’我要是早知道事情会变成这样，我早就把那群王八蛋亲手丢进疫病坑里了！现在那群执法者没完没了地缠着我们，让他们都见鬼去吧。”
languages.original_text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in the tales of Nemesite. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about some idiots who've been painting pictures on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those sods and thrown them into the pestilence pit myself! And now we'll be pestered by enforcers to no end, void damn it all."

traits.locale_text: “我也……不太确定，可能是那群吃白食的家伙把涅墨斯特的故事当真了吧。好巧不巧，我之前找过那个王八——我是说，我找过弗伦索队长，和他说过这件事情。我告诉他说总有一群白痴在墙上乱画，煽动民众，可他是怎么说的？‘一切都在我的控制之中。’我要是早知道事情会变成这样，我早就把那群王八蛋亲手丢进疫病坑里了！现在那群执法者没完没了地缠着我们，让他们都见鬼去吧。”

languages.text: "Ich ... bin nicht sicher. Vielleicht haben diese Schmarotzer die Geschichten über Nemesite geglaubt. Ich habe mich übrigens bei diesem Mistk... bei Captain Frensoe über einige Idioten beschwert, die Bilder an die Wände gemalt und die Leute aufgestachelt haben. Was meint Ihr, was er gesagt hat? 'Ich habe alles unter Kontrolle.' Hätte ich gewusst, dass es so weit kommt, hätte ich diese Kerle gepackt und eigenhändig in die Pestilenzgrube geworfen! Und jetzt werden wir ohne Ende von Enforcers belästigt, verdammte Leere!"
languages.original_text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in the tales of Nemesite. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about some idiots who've been painting pictures on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those sods and thrown them into the pestilence pit myself! And now we'll be pestered by enforcers to no end, void damn it all."

Und jetzt werden wir ohne Ende von Enforcers belästigt, verdammte Leere!"

languages.text: « Je... ne suis pas sûr. Ces parasites croyaient peut-être aux histoires de Némésite. Il se trouve que j'ai déjà signalé à ce sal... au capitaine Frensoe qu'une bande de crétins dessinaient sur les murs pour inciter les autres à la violence. Vous voulez savoir ce qu'il m'a répondu ? "Tout est sous contrôle." Si j'avais su qu'on en arriverait là, j'aurais attrapé moi-même ces ordures pour les jeter dans la fosse aux pestilences ! Dire que maintenant, on va avoir des prévôts sur le dos à longueur de journée... »
languages.original_text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in the tales of Nemesite. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about some idiots who've been painting pictures on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those sods and thrown them into the pestilence pit myself! And now we'll be pestered by enforcers to no end, void damn it all."

languages.text: "Ben... Emin değilim. Belki de o beleşçiler, Nemezit hikâyelerine inanmıştır. Tesadüf ya, o şerefs... Yüzbaşı Frensoe'ya duvarlara resimler yaparak milleti galeyana getiren birkaç ahmaktan dert yanmıştım. Peki o ne cevap verdi? 'Her şey kontrolüm altında.' İşin bu raddeye geleceğini bilseydim o pislikleri yakalayıp kendi ellerimle veba çukuruna atardım! Şimdiyse o infazcılar, bize beyhude yere musallat oldu. Uçsuz alsın hepsini."
languages.original_text: "I'm... not sure. Perhaps those freeloaders believed in the tales of Nemesite. As it happens, I've complained to that bast— to Captain Frensoe about some idiots who've been painting pictures on the walls, inciting people. And what did he say? 'I've got everything under control.' Had I known it would come to this, I'd have nabbed those sods and thrown them into the pestilence pit myself! And now we'll be pestered by enforcers to no end, void damn it all."
